description: Steroid_Use_abusemisuse_Dermatitis is a skin condition that occurs as a result of the misuse or overuse of steroid medications. It can lead to inflammation, redness, and irritation of the skin.
possible causes: Prolonged or excessive use of topical or oral steroid medications
Incorrect application of steroid creams or ointments
symptoms: Redness and irritation of the skin
Increased hair growth in the affected area
treatments: Gradual tapering of steroid medication under medical supervision
Use of moisturizers and gentle skincare products
Avoiding triggers that worsen the condition
